syllabus_leaves.path: SYLLABUS > Local Self-Government-Urban > Urban: Municipal Committees and Municipal Corporations-meaning and functions.
path_titles: Urban: Municipal Committees and Municipal Corporations-meaning and functions.
syllabus_leaves.title: Urban: Municipal Committees and Municipal Corporations-meaning and functions.

syllabus_leaves.path: THE CONSTITUTION (74TH AMENDMENT) ACT, 1992 > The salient features of the Act > The Act gives constitutional status to urban local bodies.
path_titles: The salient features of the Act
The Act gives constitutional status to urban local bodies.
syllabus_leaves.title: The Act gives constitutional status to urban local bodies.

syllabus_leaves.path: THE CONSTITUTION (74TH AMENDMENT) ACT, 1992 > The salient features of the Act > The Act provides for direct election to all the local self-government bodies.
path_titles: The salient features of the Act
The Act provides for direct election to all the local self-government bodies.
syllabus_leaves.title: The Act provides for direct election to all the local self-government bodies.

syllabus_leaves.path: THE CONSTITUTION (74TH AMENDMENT) ACT, 1992 > The salient features of the Act > A fixed tenure of five years for the municipalities has been prescribed.
path_titles: The salient features of the Act
A fixed tenure of five years for the municipalities has been prescribed.
syllabus_leaves.title: A fixed tenure of five years for the municipalities has been prescribed.

syllabus_leaves.path: THE CONSTITUTION (74TH AMENDMENT) ACT, 1992 > The salient features of the Act > 33 per cent of the seats should be reserved for women under each category of SC/ST/Backward Classes.
path_titles: The salient features of the Act
33 per cent of the seats should be reserved for women under each category of SC/ST/Backward Classes.
syllabus_leaves.title: 33 per cent of the seats should be reserved for women under each category of SC/ST/Backward Classes.

syllabus_leaves.path: THE CONSTITUTION (74TH AMENDMENT) ACT, 1992 > The salient features of the Act > District Planning Committee to be constituted by the State Government.
path_titles: The salient features of the Act
District Planning Committee to be constituted by the State Government.
syllabus_leaves.title: District Planning Committee to be constituted by the State Government.

syllabus_leaves.path: THE CONSTITUTION (74TH AMENDMENT) ACT, 1992 > The Act provides for three tier local bodies for urban areas as under: > Municipal Corporations for larger urban areas.
path_titles: The Act provides for three tier local bodies for urban areas as under:
Municipal Corporations for larger urban areas.
syllabus_leaves.title: Municipal Corporations for larger urban areas.

syllabus_leaves.path: THE CONSTITUTION (74TH AMENDMENT) ACT, 1992 > The Act provides for three tier local bodies for urban areas as under: > Municipal Councils for smaller urban areas.
path_titles: The Act provides for three tier local bodies for urban areas as under:
Municipal Councils for smaller urban areas.
syllabus_leaves.title: Municipal Councils for smaller urban areas.

syllabus_leaves.path: THE CONSTITUTION (74TH AMENDMENT) ACT, 1992 > The Act provides for three tier local bodies for urban areas as under: > Nagar Panchayats for areas in transition from a rural area to urban area.
path_titles: The Act provides for three tier local bodies for urban areas as under:
Nagar Panchayats for areas in transition from a rural area to urban area.
syllabus_leaves.title: Nagar Panchayats for areas in transition from a rural area to urban area.

syllabus_leaves.path: THE CONSTITUTION (74TH AMENDMENT) ACT, 1992 > In addition, there are Town Area Committees, Cantonment Boards and Port Trusts in certain urban areas.
path_titles: In addition, there are Town Area Committees, Cantonment Boards and Port Trusts in certain urban areas.
syllabus_leaves.title: In addition, there are Town Area Committees, Cantonment Boards and Port Trusts in certain urban areas.

syllabus_leaves.title: ELECTION

syllabus_leaves.title: TERM

syllabus_leaves.path: MUNICIPAL CORPORATION > COMPOSITION > (a) General Council
syllabus_leaves.title: (a) General Council

syllabus_leaves.title: (b) Mayor

syllabus_leaves.title: (c) The Standing Committees

syllabus_leaves.title: (d) A Municipal Commissioner.

syllabus_leaves.path: The Municipal Corporation of Delhi
syllabus_leaves.title: The Municipal Corporation of Delhi

syllabus_leaves.path: Functions of the Mayor > Considered as the 'First Citizen'
syllabus_leaves.title: Considered as the 'First Citizen'

syllabus_leaves.path: Functions of the Mayor > He/She presides over the meetings of the Corporation.
path_titles: He/She presides over the meetings of the Corporation.
syllabus_leaves.title: He/She presides over the meetings of the Corporation.

syllabus_leaves.path: Functions of the Mayor > He/She regulates and conducts business of the Corporation.
path_titles: He/She regulates and conducts business of the Corporation.
syllabus_leaves.title: He/She regulates and conducts business of the Corporation.

syllabus_leaves.path: Functions of the Mayor > He/She fixes the agenda for consideration at the meetings of the Corporation.
path_titles: He/She fixes the agenda for consideration at the meetings of the Corporation.
syllabus_leaves.title: He/She fixes the agenda for consideration at the meetings of the Corporation.

syllabus_leaves.path: Functions of the Mayor > He/She obtains reports from the Municipal Commissioner regarding various projects and programmes undertaken by the Corporation.
path_titles: He/She obtains reports from the Municipal Commissioner regarding various projects and programmes undertaken by the Corporation.
syllabus_leaves.title: He/She obtains reports from the Municipal Commissioner regarding various projects and programmes undertaken by the Corporation.

syllabus_leaves.path: Functions of the Mayor > He/She acts as a link between the Corporation and the State government.
path_titles: He/She acts as a link between the Corporation and the State government.
syllabus_leaves.title: He/She acts as a link between the Corporation and the State government.

syllabus_leaves.path: FUNCTIONS OF THE MUNICIPAL CORPORATION > Compulsory Functions > Provision of electricity, water, sewage disposal
path_titles: Provision of electricity, water, sewage disposal
syllabus_leaves.title: Provision of electricity, water, sewage disposal

syllabus_leaves.path: FUNCTIONS OF THE MUNICIPAL CORPORATION > Compulsory Functions > Provision of public health services
syllabus_leaves.title: Provision of public health services

syllabus_leaves.path: FUNCTIONS OF THE MUNICIPAL CORPORATION > Compulsory Functions > Provision of public conveniences and utilities like roads, buildings, bus-shelters, demolition of dangerous structures, plantation of trees, provision of public urinals and toilets.
path_titles: Provision of public conveniences and utilities like roads, buildings, bus-shelters, demolition of dangerous structures, plantation of trees, provision of public urinals and toilets.
syllabus_leaves.title: Provision of public conveniences and utilities like roads, buildings, bus-shelters, demolition of dangerous structures, plantation of trees, provision of public urinals and toilets.

syllabus_leaves.path: FUNCTIONS OF THE MUNICIPAL CORPORATION > Compulsory Functions > Provision of educational institutions like primary and secondary schools including organisation of adult literacy classes, organising and undertaking promotion of sports and games and providing necessary facilities.
path_titles: Provision of educational institutions like primary and secondary schools including organisation of adult literacy classes, organising and undertaking promotion of sports and games and providing necessary facilities.
syllabus_leaves.title: Provision of educational institutions like primary and secondary schools including organisation of adult literacy classes, organising and undertaking promotion of sports and games and providing necessary facilities.

syllabus_leaves.path: FUNCTIONS OF THE MUNICIPAL CORPORATION > Compulsory Functions > Maintenance of records of births and deaths and maintenance and upkeep of cremation and burial grounds.
path_titles: Maintenance of records of births and deaths and maintenance and upkeep of cremation and burial grounds.
syllabus_leaves.title: Maintenance of records of births and deaths and maintenance and upkeep of cremation and burial grounds.

syllabus_leaves.path: FUNCTIONS OF THE MUNICIPAL CORPORATION > Compulsory Functions > Undertaking of public safety and security like maintenance of fire department together with fire engines; disaster like
path_titles: Undertaking of public safety and security like maintenance of fire department together with fire engines; disaster like
syllabus_leaves.title: Undertaking of public safety and security like maintenance of fire department together with fire engines; disaster like

path_titles: Construction and maintenance of public parks, libraries, museums, theatre, akharas, picnic resorts etc.

syllabus_leaves.path: FUNCTIONS OF THE MUNICIPAL CORPORATION > 2. Discretionary or Optional Functions: > Establishing and maintaining children's homes, orphanages, old-age homes, night shelters and rest houses.
